Name: Mandurah Library and Information Service, Local Studies Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Monday to Friday 9am-8pm, Saturday 9am-12pm, closed public holidays. General reference assistance. Photocopying service (black and white to A3) available. Photographs available for reproduction (fee applies).

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to the local government area of Mandurah and the Peel Region generally. Books, serials, newspapers, pamphlets, oral history tapes, photographs, maps/plans, ephemera.
